title: Shocking video shows man throw woman's body in a suitcase into a dumpster in Colorado
text:
Police in Colorado have released a chilling video showing a man removing a suitcase containing a woman's body from a car trunk and throwing it into a dumpster.

The disturbing incident took place shortly before 7am on Thursday at 3906 Ivywood Lane in Pueblo.

Police were called to the area two hours later to a report of a suspicious suitcase found in the trash.

When they opened the bag, they discovered the woman's lifeless body inside.

The Pueblo Police Department has released a disturbing video showing a man disposing of a woman's body in a dumpster on Thursday morning

Surveillance footage shows the suspect pull up to the dumpster at 3906 Ivywood Lane in Pueblo. He emerges from the sedan and opens the lid of the trash bin

He walks to the back and opens the trunk to remove a large suitcase

The man than carries the seemingly heavy bag to the nearby dumpster

He unceremoniously drops the suitcase containing the woman's body inside and walks away

The unnamed victim was described as wearing an Air Force T-shirt, M&M candy-themed shorts, with several tattoos on her body.

'She had a very distinctive tattoo on her right thigh of a female clown,' police said in a press release.

On Thursday, the department released the surveillance video capturing the moment the victim's body was dumped in the trash.

The footage shows a man pull up to the dumpster in a dark blue sedan, approach the trash bin and open the lid.

He then walks over to the rear of the vehicle, opens the trunk and removes a large suitcase, which he then carries to the open dumpster and tosses inside.

They also made public images of the victim's tattoos, including a female clown found on her thigh (left) and a pair of hearts (center and right)

Police released a screenshot showing the dark blue, four-door sedan the suspect was driving

After closing back the lid, the man quickly gets back in the car and drives off.

Police also released still photos showing the slain woman's body art, including the female clown tattoo and two hearts.

Investigators appealed to the public for help in identifying the suspect.

As of Friday afternoon, they have not named the victim or her alleged killer, but multiple users on Facebook wrote in the comments section on the police department's page that the case involves a man who killed his mother.

Several users claiming to be the victim's relatives divulged her name and posted condolences.

Dailymail.com contacted the Pueblo Police Department seeking confirmation and was awaiting a reply.
description: The Pueblo Police Department in Colorado has released a disturbing video showing a man casually disposing of a woman's body in a dumpster on Thursday morning.
